item.description:
Hike Description: Owl's Head (the other one) on Cherry Mountain, possibly including Martha's Mile and Mt Martha. This is a winter hike, traction and probably snowshoes required

Difficulty/hike rating: Anywhere from Intermediate to Advanced, depending on snow conditions.

Mileage: 5.0m RT (Owl's Head only) 6.6m RT (including Mt Martha)

Elevation gain: 2000 ft to Owl's Head

AMC Booktime: 3:30 to Owl's Head, add an hour or so to do Martha's Mile

Owl's Head Trailhead: rumor has it that it is sometimes plowed, otherwise part roadside.

The views of Mt Washington and the northern presi's from Owl's Head are spectacular.

CALL ME FOR THE PARK AND RIDE SO I KNOW YOU ARE WAITING THERE

group.name: Lebanon/White River Junction Hiking Meetup Group

item.name: Carpool to Whites for a smaller hike 6.6 mi
